package.description:
Guests can login with their Twitter account. The logged in Twitter users are considered here as as External Users.

How to setup Twitter OAuth
Go to twitter.com/oauth_clients/ to register your Twitter OAuth app.
As callback URL use: http://www.example.com/inner.php/user/login/twitter.html?etask=auth
Set here the Consumer key and Consumer secret options you got from Twitter.
